data.name: Global Azure Bootcamp Austria 2020
data.description: All around the world user groups and communities will come together from April 23 - April 25, 2020 once again in the seventh Global Azure Bootcamp event. Join us on Friday, April 24, 2020 in Linz.

relatedRecords.name: CodeCrafts Vienna
relatedRecords.description: CodeCrafts is a community-driven conference all about crafting exceptional software. A unique inclusive event where passionate Software Engineers, Local Heroes, and International Thought Leaders come together in the heart of Vienna to grow and influence your mindset and technical expertise.

relatedRecords.name: Silicon Saxony Day
relatedRecords.description: The 15th Silicon Saxony Day takes place at the BallsportArena Dresden on May 27, 2020. The biggest high-tech event in Saxony offers unique insight into future technologies and business solutions covering hardware, software and connectivity topics. relatedRecords.name: Voxxed Days Microservices
relatedRecords.description: Voxxed Days Microservices is a two-days conference (+1 optional workshop day) focussed purely on Microservices. Let’s meet in Paris on the 29-31st October 2018.
